defining_moments.title: Navigating a Cultural Divide
defining_moments.description: During a group project, I faced a language barrier with an international student. By learning basic phrases in their language, I bridged the gap, fostering collaboration and mutual respect.

defining_moments.title: Overcoming Stage Fright
defining_moments.description: Terrified of public speaking, I volunteered to present at a school assembly. Through practice and visualization techniques, I conquered my fear, gaining confidence and a newfound appreciation for storytelling.

defining_moments.title: Reviving a Dormant Club
defining_moments.description: I took on the challenge of revitalizing a defunct tech club at school. By organizing engaging workshops and recruiting new members, I transformed it into a thriving community hub.
